settings.label: font-family-sans-serif
settings.default: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif

settings.label: font-family-monospace
settings.default: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace

settings.label: font-size-root
settings.info: Pixel value used to responsively scale all typography. Applied to the `<html>` element.

settings.label: btn-border-radius
settings.info: Allows for customizing button radius independently from global border radius

settings.label: tag-pill-border-radius
settings.info:
Use a higher than normal value to ensure completely rounded edges when
customizing padding or font-size on labels.

settings.label: modal-inner-padding
settings.info: Padding applied to the modal body
